Mr. Kickass..I think ur uploads kick all other uploaders torrents in their bloomin' arse for 2 known reasons..the quality and the format (mp4)..mkv is a good format but I certainly prefer good ol' mp4..its incredible how u make ur files so small..though I do have an excellent connection..it sure saves my hard-drive space..but just one favour:
Could u pls upload more of the old classics..preferably some of the foreign ones too..cos we all know there are a god awful lot of uploaders uploading the new films..I aint asking u to stop uploading the new ones..but to alternate then with the old ones.

Thanks and Kindest Regards,
An ardent fan
